title: Start/Sit Decisions + TNF Preview, Buy or Sell - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/20
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as we enter Week 7! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason answer a handful of questions in what may be the worst Bye Week of all time! Which players make for the toughest start or sit decisions? Plus, a new edition of Buy or Sell, and a fantasy preview of the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Browns and Broncos. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 20th, 2021.
  
 (06:05) - Buy or Sell
 (15:05) - NFL News
 (22:45) - Mailbag
 (38:25) - Thursday Night Preview - Broncos at Browns
  
 Connect with the show:
